title: Description of frictional forces exerted on box

content.question: Which of the following best describes the frictional forces exerted on the box and on the floor while the box is sliding?

choices.label: Box Floor To the right To the right
Box Floor To the right To the left
Box Floor To the left None
Box Floor To the left To the right

content.answer: Box Floor To the left To the right

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
